name: Running Rancid
blurb: Combat of Road Rash, graphics/destruction of Split/Second, upgrading like MotorStorm, with a crazy speeding Zombie between your legs!

rewards.reward: No Reward

A simple way to have your say within the comments section. Ask questions to your hearts content and we shall try our best to answer them the best that we can. Thanks for your support, every bit counts!

Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Supporters" in the credits. (Just a comical insight into your opinion on the use of zombies for entertainment purposes)\r\n\r\nYour name shall be carefully stitched into the credits with much love and adoration. Thank you greatly for your support!

Credited as one of our Kickstarter "Running Rancid Protesters" in the credits. (Just a comical insight into your opinion on the use of zombies for entertainment purposes)\r\n\r\nYour name shall be carefully stitched into the credits with much love and adoration. Thank you greatly for your support!
EARLY BIRD - Final Beta Code. (Details may be dependant on third party agreements)\r\n\r\nPLUS: Credited as one of our Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.
Final Beta Code. (Details may be dependant on third party agreements)\r\n\r\nPLUS: Credited as one of our Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

EARLY BIRD - Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic!

A short story, beautifully drawn by our talented artist Cyrena Sitter, depicting the back story given to this unique racing franchise. See how a business man saw profit in exploitation of the not-yet dead.

PLUS: Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our  Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic!

A short story, beautifully drawn by our talented artist Cyrena Sitter, depicting the back story given to this unique racing franchise. See how a business man saw profit in exploitation of the not-yet dead.

PLUS: Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

EARLY BIRD - Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book. A collection of concept art and 3D renders, including maps and many other design features.\r\n\r\nPLUS: Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book. A collection of concept art and 3D renders, including maps and many other design features.\r\n\r\nPLUS: Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

You receive a custom version of one of the in game weapons. This will have a special exclusive Kickstarter paint texture with your name somewhere on it! PLUS: Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

You receive TWO custom versions of the in game weapons. This will have a special exclusive Kickstarter paint texture with your name somewhere on it! PLUS: Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

EARLY BIRD - Access to all versions of the development (Alpha through to Final Beta). Access to the development forum where your ideas have direct influence in the development. Such things as in-game art and images, controls and other various feature. Also you will have influence over which weapons & upgrades should be included, along with which mini game should be included. You will also be featured as one of the  "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. PLUS: Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Access to all versions of the development (Alpha through to Final Beta). Access to the development forum where your ideas have direct influence in the development. Such things as in-game art and images, controls and other various feature. Also you will have influence over which weapons & upgrades should be included, along with which mini game should be included. You will also be featured as one of the  "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. PLUS: Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Become the incoherent chanting and chatter of the audience in the background. (your audio quality is not as important for this. Please note that the lesser quality audio will be less audible in the game.) You will be given a script of vocal things to interpret. (such as hoots, cheers, chants, and random shouting)\r\n\r\nPLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Become the voice of a 'Supporter'. (Must be able to record yourself clearly, or be available in Edmonton during recording sessions) Supporters are individuals who are in support of using the Zombies as entertainment in the game. They are on the side lines chanting, encouraging and helping the riders. Also be added in the credits under "Kickstarter Voice Actors".\r\n\r\nPLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Become the voice of a 'Protester'. (Must be able to record yourself clearly, or be available in Edmonton during recording sessions) Protesters are individuals fighting for the rights of the Zombies in the game. They are on the side lines chanting and distracting the riders. Also be added in the credits under "Kickstarter Voice Actors".\r\n\r\nPLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Become a fully rendered 'Supporter'. You will have a 3D model made of yourself, to be seen on the side lines and possibly used as a setback or diversion against other racers. You will also be credited as "Kickstarter Support Actors" in the credits. You will also have the option to record your own voice (Must be able to record yourself clearly, or be available in Edmonton during recording sessions) or choose one of the ones from the previous tier. Also be added in the credits under "Kickstarter Voice Actors"(if you choice to voice yourself) PLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Become a fully rendered 'Protester'. You will have a 3D model made of yourself, to be seen on the side lines and possibly used as a setback or diversion against other racers. Become one of the default MALE 3D RIDER models. Work closely with our team to recreate your ideal self as a Zombie. You will also be give the option to voice your character. This could make for an excellent surprise gift for a loved one. They will also be credited as "Main Actors" in the credits. Also be added in the credits under "Kickstarter Voice Actors"(if you choice to voice yourself) PLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.

Have your house, apartment or room in the game! Work closely with our team to fit your interior (and exterior if it is suitable) into the game to be used as a "Short-cut". This allows players to race through your recreated living space. Imagine players demolishing your coffee table, smashing into your lamps or maybe jumping over your favourite chair! Don\u2019t worry we can even make your 32\u201d tv in to an 80\u201d to enhance your (wo)man cave! (This could also include any pictures you may have that are not copyright infractions.) You will also be able to help us in naming this short-cut. PLUS: Access to all versions of the development, featured as one of the "Kickstarter Development Crew" in the credits. Digital copy of Running Rancid Art Book, Digital copy of the Running Rancid Comic, Final Beta Code and Credited as one of our Kickstarter Running Rancid Protesters or Supporters in the credits.
